scripts.test-sps-manager: ng build --prod --project=metapunk-sps-manager --base-href / && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/*.ts electron/ &&tsc --p electron && mkdir -p electron/dist/node_modules electron/dist/www && cp -r dist/metapunk-sps-manager/* electron/dist/www/ && cp -rf electron/plugins/nova-serve electron/dist/node_modules && cp -rf electron/screenlock_64.node electron/dist/screenlock.node && cp -rf electron/screenlock_32.node electron/dist/screenlock_32.node  && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/* electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/splash electron/dist/www/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/build electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/assets electron/dist/www/ && electron electron/dist/main.app.js
scripts.release-sps-manager: ng build --prod --project=metapunk-sps-manager --base-href / && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/*.ts electron/ &&tsc --p electron && mkdir -p electron/dist/node_modules electron/dist/www && cp -r dist/metapunk-sps-manager/* electron/dist/www/ && cp -rf electron/plugins/nova-serve electron/dist/node_modules && cp -rf electron/screenlock_64.node electron/dist/screenlock.node && cp -rf electron/screenlock_32.node electron/dist/screenlock_32.node  && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/* electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/splash electron/dist/www/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/build electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/metapunk-sps-manager/assets electron/dist/www/ && cp -f electron/dist/main.app.js electron/dist/main.js && cp -f electron/dist/main.app.js.map electron/dist/main.js.map
scripts.pack-sps-manager: npm run release-sps-manager && cd electron && ./make.sh metapunk-sps-manager
scripts.electron: cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/*.ts electron/ &&tsc --p electron && mkdir -p electron/dist/node_modules electron/dist/www && cp -r dist/${projectId}/* electron/dist/www/ && cp -rf electron/plugins/nova-serve electron/dist/node_modules && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/* electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/splash electron/dist/www/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/build electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/assets electron/dist/www/ && electron electron/dist/main${mainFix}.js
scripts.electron-build: ng build --project=${projectId} --base-href / && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/*.ts electron/ &&tsc --p electron && mkdir -p electron/dist/node_modules electron/dist/www && cp -r dist/${projectId}/* electron/dist/www/ && cp -rf electron/plugins/nova-serve electron/dist/node_modules && cp -rf electron/screenlock_64.node electron/dist/screenlock.node && cp -rf electron/screenlock_32.node electron/dist/screenlock_32.node  && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/* electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/splash electron/dist/www/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/build electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/assets electron/dist/www/ && electron electron/dist/main${mainFix}.js
scripts.electron-release: ng build --project=${projectId} --base-href / && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/*.ts electron/ &&tsc --p electron && mkdir -p electron/dist/node_modules electron/dist/www && cp -r dist/${projectId}/* electron/dist/www/ && cp -rf electron/plugins/nova-serve electron/dist/node_modules && cp -rf electron/screenlock_64.node electron/dist/screenlock.node && cp -rf electron/screenlock_32.node electron/dist/screenlock_32.node  && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/* electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/splash electron/dist/www/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/build electron/dist/ && cp -r electron/apps/${appId}/assets electron/dist/www/
